item.title: Maley 2013 MEKF for Nonspinning Guided Projectiles
Whampsey MEKF
item.description: Source: http://matthewhampsey.github.io/blog/2020/07/18/mekf Motivation Working with noisy IMU measurements IMUs usually provide redundant information that can be used to improve dead-reckoning Uses: Hamilton quaternion convention . Which orientation parametrisation to choose? 50.5-error-state-kalman-filter
